article.content:
This is a translation project for the pinkTheme . This theme presents appliances for the Firefox that give to the browser a colorful and cheerful looking. There is a interaction process between the user and the site that allows to choose drawings and colors to participate of the custom process of some details. We are working in the translations for other languages - soon we already will have the first versions Portuguese and French. See news:

http://g1.globo.com/Noticias/Tecnologia/0,,MUL297130-6174,00-FIREFOX+TEM+APLICATIVOS+ATE+PARA+PINTALO+DE+ROSA+CONHECA.html



  • PinkPaula V2 for Firefox
Pink Paula V2 is a theme for Firefox 2, that presents artistic and gracious details. The users can select the elements as they like to install them into their browser. These details don't change the browser funcionality. Translation achieved from English language to French, Portuguese (ptbr), and Spanish language.
  • SearchStyle
Translation of this subject, that is subdivided into three ways:

SearchStyle, from English language to Portuguese , and French language.

SearchStyle custom from English language to Portuguese, Spanish and French language.

SearchStyle results from English language to Portuguese, Spanish and French language.
